snippet.title: Bad Pad - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Bad Pad is a metal pumped metroidvania platfomer about a gamepad's buttons who came to life.
Oozing with original music and storytelling songs, all in the spirit of metal.
Join Square in his adventures, survive Evil Pen's hellish castles, help save Hexa and TZ and probably the rest of the world!

Visit Bad Pad's website:
http://badpadgame.com

Bad Pad on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/517210
